answers.answer: Fred, go to my journal and read my "Fatigue can be a symptom in a wide range of very serious conditions"I can't post it on the forum it's to large!

Hi,There can be hundred and one reasons for these symptoms as already mentioned, a few of them are :1. hypothyroidism2. Diabetes3. problems with adrenal glands4. Low on sodium / potassiumand so onBetter to go to a good physician and get an overall body check up done.Solace

Don't drink aspartame, also.  It is famous for giving brain fog.  (It's an artificial sweetener -- if you love diet soda, look on the label to see what is giving it the sweet flavor.  Ditto sugarless gum.)

question: I am a 50 year old male who has always been active and full of energy, except for the last few years.  I have been to many different Doctors and none of them can figure out what is wrong.  Besides being tired, I am quick to anger, have what I call Brain Fog, can't remember words and how to spell them from time to time.....etc
title: Tired Of Being Tired
